column1: This project is insane. I don’t understand how there isn’t more buzz about it. Hudson yards will forever change the face and pulse of Manhattan.
I moved out of the city months ago, what's going on?
Largest real estate project in history, 16 new skyscrapers with a bunch of other really cool stuff. Check it out on YouTube & google
That's really interesting, I'm mostly getting stuff about the stairs that are being built, but that's really cool
Amazing photo. It looks like a rendering.
